title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka: A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Features a pear-shaped Emerald gemstone with exceptional clarity and luster. Adorned with meticulously placed Zircon stones for maximum brilliance. Finished with a lustrous Pearl drop
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design reimagined with a contemporary flair. Features an intricate floral motif with a pear-shaped Emerald as the focal point. The Zircon-studded floral design cascades down to a bell-shaped Jhumka, creating a stunning visual impact. The filigree-like detailing on the Jhumka showcases the skill of our artisans. Finished with a delicate pearl drop.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally stunning for modern events and parties.
description: Embrace the timeless beauty of South Indian craftsmanship with this exquisite Jhumka. The vibrant Emerald symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, while the Zircon stones add a touch of modern sparkle. The perfect blend of tradition and contemporary design, this Jhumka is a true heirloom piece. Durable and crafted to last generations.
